column1: 'term: Absolute Value	description: A number’s distance from zero.For any x; is defined as follows; |x| =  −x; if x < 0; x; if x ≥ 0.'
'term: Acute Angle	description: An angle whose measure is greater than 0 and less than 90 degrees.'
'term: Base	description: In geometry any side of a triangle may be called the base.'
